name: VertexCapital
0:
”Alexa, ask Vertex Capital to play the latest update”
”Alexa, ask Vertex Capital to tell me about the company”
”Alexa, ask Vertex Capital to tell me about the managing partner”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vertex capital
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hear the latest viewpoint on investing and personal finance from your advisors at Vertex Capital. Enable this skill then say, "Alexa, ask Vertex Capital for the update."

Other things you can ask:

First say, "Alexa, open Vertex Capital."

"Tell me about the company."
"Tell me about Michael Baker."
"Tell me about Ross Marynell."
"Tell me about the Managing Partner."
"Play the latest update."

At Vertex Capital Advisors, you’ll quickly find that our passion for people is what sets us apart from other firms. 

At our core, we value families and strive to help you connect a deeper meaning to your wealth as both an individual and as a family. While our services for each client may vary, the intention behind what we do reflects our following values: Education, Dependability, Honesty, and Service. 

Whether we meet in person or virtually, our goal is to help you gain confidence and clarity with your financial life. By working together through a process that is tailored to your needs, we will look to identify solutions that will benefit both you and your loved ones. 

Learn more: www.vertexcapitaladvisors.com

Follow us: 
Twitter: @MichaelHBaker
LinkedIn: Vertex Capital Advisors LLC

Launch your own custom Alexa Skill like this. Request a demo: WealthVoice.ai

Investment advisory and financial planning services offered through Advisory Alpha, LLC, a SEC Registered Investment Advisor. Insurance, Consulting and Education services offered through Vertex Capital Advisors. Vertex Capital Advisors is a separate and unaffiliated entity from Advisory Alpha, LLC. All opinions expressed by Michael Baker and Ross Marynell are solely their own opinions and do not reflect the opinions of Advisory Alpha. These recording are for informational purposes only and should not be relied upon for investment decisions. All third party ratings are date stamped at the time the rating was given. Ratings that are dated prior to January 1st, 2022 may not reflect the current offerings or services of the financial advisor and should be disregarded if found inaccurate. Amazon dot com allows the issuance of ratings in the ordinary course of business through the use of this site. No compensation was provided directly or indirectly by the advisor in connection with obtaining or using the third-party rating.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
